author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Modify the scenario 2026D47 to have the correct wafer size of Nose. It works with V11 version of HGCal and is used for HFNose studies with the workflow 22434.0

#### PR validation:

Tested using runTheMatrix.py for the given workflow

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hcx236 Modify the scenario 2026D47
